name: 4ORTY6YX-OFFICIAL-MD
description: A whatsapp bot developed by 4orty6yx official

PREFIX.description: choose a prefix for commands on your bot

AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: use yes fo automatic status viewing just now,else set no)

READ_MESSAGES.description: use yes for the bot to autoread messsages and bluetick everyone who messages you,else set no)

AUTO_DOWNLOAD_STATUS.description: use yes for all statuses to be sent to your own dm,esle set no

BOT_NAME.description: set A name for your bot

BOT_MENU_LINKS.description: add an image to appear on your bot menu

PUBLIC_MODE.description: use yes to set public anyone can use the bot for basic functions,else set no to use private mode

SESSION_ID.description: enter your session ID here,the one recieved after pairing

OWNER_NAME.desc: set Your Name to appear on the menu

NUMERO_OWNER.desc: Your phone number in international format without plus sign, e.g. 254795900001)

WARN_COUNT.desc: the number of times one will be warned for violating certain rules before action is taken

STARTING_BOT_MESSAGE.description: use yes to set a message when the bot connects or restarts,else use no

PRESENCE.description: Mark your presence: 1 to indicate that you are online even if you are not. 2 to indicate that you are currently typing a message. 3 to indicate that you are currently recording an audio. Or leave the field blank to indicate your real state.

ANTI_DELETE_MESSAGE.description: use yes to automatically get deleted messages else set no
